Description.Name: Drive Repairs
Description.Details: An extensive overhaul of the drive engines is a top priority. Without this upgrade, we run the possible that we will blow up in the vast reaches of space if we had to put any kind of increased load on the drive engines. Repairing the drive engines will increase drive output by 20%.

AssignedCastDescription: The Argo's drive is only operating at a fraction of its potential, Commander. With significant time and materials, I believe I can repair the output of the fusion reactors thereby cutting travel time to and from planets.
